title: Ticket #1969: libdeltacloud update
description:
The libdeltacloud api has changed. Condor's usage needs to be updated along with it.

Email from Ian Main: 

Sorry for the late addition of this patch.  This is to follow a new
release of libdeltacloud which supports specifying hardware profile
overrides for memory cpu and storage.

This patch requires that you use the latest libdeltacloud:

http://people.redhat.com/~clalance/libdeltacloud-0.7-rpms.tar.bz2

The patch is attached.  I'm hoping we can still squeak it in as it's
pretty straight forward stuff and only affects the deltacloud part.  I
also appologize because I know you just finished testing it :)

Some additional changes will be needed to update the libdeltacloud external for the UW-Madison builds.
